setup_script_description: sets focus on a link after the Combobox
task: navigate backwards to collapsed select-only combobox
specific_user_instruction: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Control+Option+Left Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the combobox.
output_assertions: Text of the selected option ('Choose a Fruit') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
